verses.name: John 7:17
verses.text: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

verses.name: John 7:18
verses.text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.

verses.name: John 7:19
verses.text: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?

verses.name: John 7:20
verses.text: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?
